name: Eszkimó
overview: It must be a little boring for Eskimo kids at the endless homelands. Of course, having one gives you enough to do a curious little brother who keeps wandering off, you get involved in the most ridiculous adventures, and you're like, you can always search He's not home right now. You can go after him and get ready, there's something else you need to rescue if maybe you'll find it. It's not gonna be easy. Fantastic things are happening. It's a good thing that you're a peaceful crowd, snowballs and all. Good luck with that.
